website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, portable, low-cost solution for those who desire a simple booster seat.
pros: Easily fits into cars of different makes and models
cons: No LATCH system for extra security
Might not fit larger children as well as it does smaller children

customer_reviews.title: Fits three across
customer_reviews.text: Love these, my boys have used for two years and just got my daughter one. Fits three across without any issue, fit in my contoured seats, easy to clean (removable cover) and no complaints in comfort ever.
customer_reviews.author: Chris732

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. They stack up nicely. With all 3 in place there's room for the kids to put their own seatbelts on. I have a Honda CRV for your reference.
customer_reviews.author: E. Caaya

customer_reviews.title: Slim Design! Yes, Three Car Seats Fit Across!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a slim design booster that doesn't have all the bells and whistles - like cup holders that take up extra room! We needed a slim design booster for a smaller 8 year old. Three car seats across the backseat of a Ford Escape. Seatbelt fits well and the seat itself was fine. No complaints from our little passenger. Even more impressive? Three across in my daughters Jetta! Thanks Cosco!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Good option for travel - way cheaper than renting
customer_reviews.text: This is a no-frills booster that's relatively compact and light weight. It was perfect to take on a recent flight - it fit inside our infant car seat (within an infant car seat bag) that we gate-checked. A one-week rental at Alamo for a booster seat is something ridiculous like $70 (total scam!). Cheap and easy to just bring our own.
customer_reviews.author: MFA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative if you don't take long trips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a seat that was very well worn! This seat is definitely at a great price point & neutral color which makes it even more desirable. I have my son seat in a 2016 chevy cruze & it fits well, but I do wish that this seat clamped in to the car. I do like that it is simple to pull in & out when I have guests in the back seat, but this seat is not desirable for long trips as it tips easily & if your little one likes to move even with a belt on the seat begins to slip.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Griffith

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Wery small and low-profile-- we have a 12 passenger van and can fit 2 of these these side-by-side with all but the biggest five-point carseats-- bigger boosters are too wide and cause us to lose an entire seat because we can only get 3 carseats in instead of four. I would not buy this if your child is overweight, but for any other purposes, ESPECIALLY multiple children, I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa Huskey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you want something hard to sit on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would make a nice cushy ride for my kid. It really looks comfortable from the pic. I was surprised this thing had almost NO CUSHION! I returned it immediately. Positive: nice fabric, nice print
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper3263

customer_reviews.title: It works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for what we needed. A little on the narrow side and definitely lean on the padding. Only needed it for a couple of months to replace another that was somewhat bulkier and sat higher (too high in our new SUV), while transitioning to no more booster seats for good. I probably would not have used this one daily for the last several years though, due to the lack of padding. I would feel guilty making my son sit on something this hard for long periods of time...
customer_reviews.author: skat79

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than most...
customer_reviews.text: ...but that's what I was looking for - to fit between my two Britax Frontiers in my Murano, for the occasions we have an extra kid in the car. No other booster could do it and allow me to still access the seat belt clip. Great little booster.
customer_reviews.author: Window Shopping

customer_reviews.title: I love how narrow the seat is but the arm rests ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how narrow the seat is but the arm rests make it difficult to buckle up. My daughter used to buckle up by herself in her old one, but it was too wide so we got this one. Now she needs my help almost every single time and that's a bit of a pain. There also isn't a lot of padding, but she likes it so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Jo Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, lightweight, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: We got this booster for a 3 across setup in the 3rd row of our Honda Odyssey. It is perfect for what we need! It is narrow and lightweight and so inexpensive. For a daily booster or a travel booster this is a great option. Our 3 across setup is a Britax Allegiance, Cosco Topside, and Cosco Finale. They all fit wonderfully next to each other and there is still plenty of room for my 7 year old to get his seatbelt buckled.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This is super cheap - both in price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was the cheapest backless booster seat I could find. It does work, yes, But it does also feel REALLY cheap. We have three kids and have spent a fortune on car seats between two cars and grandparent cars and I was just not wanting to spend more. Would I buy it again? Hmm. Maybe I would but I might pay a little more to get the next cheapest seat. Definitely buy this as a backup for someone's car where they ride infrequently. But for everyday use, you may want to splurge on something less cheap. That said, if you need to get the cheapest seat, this will likely work well enough.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Poor lap belt placement.
customer_reviews.text: Did not place the lap belt properly for our six and seven year olds. If the belt was under the extension arms it was placed on top of their legs (vice hip bones) and if it’s placed above the extensions it rises above the hips on the stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah James

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this booster because we keep our granddaughter during the day, and our mode of transportation changes between bus and ridesharing. Before she was in a booster, we chose to take the bus because we didn’t want to take her big car seat everywhere we went. Now that she’s in a booster, we chose this one because it’s not only small, but it’s lightweight. It takes little effort to put in and take out of a car, and super easy to carry everywhere we go because of the fact that it is so lightweight. I also have to mention, I couldn’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom24Monsters

customer_reviews.title: Convenience isn't safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a small & convenient booster seat, but it moves around easily & would not be safe if I was in a car accident. My daughter constantly complained that it was slipping out from under her butt while driving around. I bought a different model that cost more, but it clicks into the metal car seat hooks behind my seat so it doesn't move & makes me feel better knowing my child is safe. Plus she stopped complaining!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Small Car and Travelling
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time ordering these. We first ordered a couple two years ago when we flew to the UK and had a rental car for 2 weeks. We bunged these in a suitcase and used them while over there - much cheaper than hiring from the rental company. When we left I gave them to one of my friends over there for her to use. Fast forward to last month and we downsized from our mini van to a Toyota Corolla - our regular Graco seats barely fit and the kids struggled to click in their seatbelts. Re-ordered these and they fit much better.
customer_reviews.author: Busyworkingmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who need to fit three across in a car or SUV
customer_reviews.text: For people looking for a narrow car seat to fit three across the back seat of a sedan or 4-door passenger car, this booster seat worked for us. The arms are cushy, which allows them to be squeezed between two other booster seats.
customer_reviews.author: JMHaha

customer_reviews.title: Easy seat
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our almost 5 year old. She is 50 pounds and fits great. Her favorite color is purple so we were happy to find a purple one. This is super easy to use and came out of the box ready to go. All I had to do was set it in the car. It uses the normal seatbelts. There are no exposed plastic parts to get hot in the car. And the armrests give her a spot her height. We like it. Its light and easy to move around. But not ajustble arms.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Good Booster!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller booster as I’m now going to be fitting 3 across. This seemed like a good choice. It’s light weight. The color is beautiful! (We have turquoise). It’s easy to maneuver for kids. The ONLY flaw I have is the seat belt path. Unlike most seat belts, this requires you to go under the arm rest for your lap and then over for the chest piece. My kids are not use to this and it’s taken a few reminders to get it right. I could see a parent who does not look at the instructions using wrong. Besides this, wonderful car seat! May actually buy another for my second car.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasaurusx3

customer_reviews.title: It does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this booster seat for my 7 year old (who is the size of a 5 yrs old) for the convenience of using in more than one vehicle. It does just that. The seat puts my daughter up high enough for the seatbelt to be where it's supposed to. She hasn't complained that the seat is uncomfortable, so I guess that's another plus. Bottom line: The seat is great when you have more than one vehicle. It's light weight, and you don't have to tether it in, although it's recommended to do so when not in use so it doesn't become a flying projectile in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysNJGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works 3 across in Jeep Grand Cherokee 2015
customer_reviews.text: This is working well in both a mazda 3 and a Jeep Grand Cherokee, with 3 seats. We have a rear facing Chicco baby seat and a gracCo behemoth toddler chair, this fits in great with the other two. It is very light weight. There is a very thin pad atop the plastic, so for a long ride it could get uncomfortable but my child has never complained. It would be easy to fold up a thin blanket or towel to add some cushion if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Says Comfy
customer_reviews.text: But don't believe it. It is just hard plastic with a cover on it. Bought this for our grand-daughter when we take her on trips.. If we do a long road trip, her rear would be sore and numb by the time we got there.. So this will be used for when she's with us going to the store or just out.. but for longer times in the car, we'll just use her main one in her dad's truck.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: CHILD CAR BOOSTER SEATS
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat was very shallow and too narrow so I returned for a refund. The material did not seem it would stand the test over time! Because it was narrow, it fit my 6 year old petite granddaughter but was overly narrow for my 8 year old grandson! After testing on a clean surface I could see it was a poor overall quality booster seat, Because it was a very shallow inner perameter, I felt it lacked the stability and adequate security needed for a child's safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but protection first
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I don’t like driving with my nephew in the proper car seat. And since he grew out of his old car seat and he’s 4 years old now I thought a booster seat would be great because he can use it until it’s time for the next age booster seat at 6 years old. This is great for his size and easy to adjust the seat belt to him with another piece I use so it properly goes across his ches and not his neck.
customer_reviews.author: marshana johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get this, you don't need a fancy booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple, cheap and easy for a toddler to get into. The point of a booster seat is to lift the child to obtain maximum effectiveness of the seat belt. Guess what a pile of bricks can do that too you don't need a, $200 booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that the shoulder strap has to go over ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most light-weight booster seat out there! It fits in the middle seat in the back of my Prius, in-between two other car seats. Which is kind of a miracle? The only thing I don't like is that the shoulder strap has to go over the arm rest, rather than under it. This means by 6 year old is BARELY tall enough to use this booster, because of where that makes the shoulder strap fall on him.
customer_reviews.author: genissimo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay..
customer_reviews.text: Brought this booster seat as a replacement. My child was constantly complaining that her bum hurts if she stays longer times.Cheaply made and no cushion at all...I gave it away to someone in need..what a disappointment..
customer_reviews.author: Couch Potato

customer_reviews.title: Lap Belt Safety Concern
customer_reviews.text: This Booster Seat seemed ideal. It was a good price point and not too bulky. The main issue is the lap belt arms that hold the lap belt down are shallow and the lap belt pops up over the arms this makes the seat ineffective and a risk for potential internal bleeding if you were in an accident. I am returning our seat and spending a little more money for something that offers more safety.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is a pretty good seat for the price - Lightweight and does ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because if your child is not skinny they are going to get stuck in the seat when getting out. The seat is comfy when they are in it but when the kid tries to get out they are going to have to hold the handles and stand up. My daughter is in the 40th percentile for weight for a 7 year old and this happens to her most every time. Otherwise it is a pretty good seat for the price - Lightweight and does not dent the seat as advertised. However its not as tall as the other regular seats - which is okay if you have a taller child.
customer_reviews.author: Avanis Mum

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love these seats! I have a Chevy equinox and needed to switch my two daughters into boosters, not just because they are at the proper height and weight now, but also because we needed something more narrow to fit our soon to be born daughters car seat too! The two boosters and car seat fit perfectly! I did buy some seatbelt adjusters after reading some reviews about seatbelt positioning. So far they have been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Ace

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It’s better than nothing!
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t a super comfortable seat for my daughter. We got it for a trip to Houston and by the end of it, we had bought something g else. The quality wasn’t great, and we didn’t feel like it was a good quality for the price. If you have no other potions, it’ll do in a pinch, but there are definitely other boosters available!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie WitkowskiTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Usable, but a little too wide
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this booster to be able to squeeze in a third kid in the middle seat (between two other boosters) when needed. From that perspective, it worked. However, despite the simplicity of the booster, the arm rests cause it to be too wide and I have to buckle the middle child in before anyone sits in the window seat. Otherwise it's impossible to get the seat belt buckled on the other side. So usable, but cumbersome due to its width.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great spare booster seat
customer_reviews.text: I babysit my toddler niece occasionally, and her parents usually forget to leave me with their booster seat. So, I purchased this so that I would have one on hand, if I ever wanted to take her to the store or park. It's really lightweight and compact, so there were no issues with fastening the seat belt. The color makes it easy to spot. For quick trips, this seems great. Not sure for longer rides.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thai

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: As far as basic car seats go, this one is a winner! It is SO light weight. When the package was delivered, the box literally felt empty! It's really slender, which is a priceless feature when you have multiple car seats in the vehicle! My 5 year old says it's super comfy. The camo design is also good at camouflaging the little spills :), although the cover slips off easily for washing. There are definitely fancier models on the market, but you can't beat this, for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Donnie & Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy the grandkids fit in to booster seats - no more renting big bulky car seats for when they come visit. I’ve bought Cosco baby products many times through the years and have always been satisfied. These were on sale so I was able to get two for little more than one would have cost locally. I’m totally an amazon shopper. Why run yourself ragged trying to find what you want when Amazon probably has it and probably for less.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Functional product, great price, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Visiting family out of town, bought two of these to accommodate kids for short road trips. Very lightweight, compact, straightforward car seat. Kids were comfortable. Unbeatable price for the forest pattern seat cover. It's a little cheesy, but A) it really doesn't matter cuz there's usually a butt covering it, and B) could hide the snack spill and "other" accident stains, so it's fairly practical.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: A keeper!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a temporary solution for my son's children when they flew in and were going to rent a vehicle at the airport. Our grandchildren loved the so much my son had to take them with him on their return flight rather than donate them as we had intended. I would say that is a win! When children find something comfortable for them they use it without any fuss!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These booster seats are awesome. I have 3 kids. 2 in boosters , one still in a carseat. These seats are small enough to fit into the backseat of a Ford escape hybrid and a Chevy equinox LT with a carseat! That's close to impossible with every other booster I've purchased. The reason for 4 stars is my 10 year old does not yet meet New York state requirements to be out of a booster seat, but her hips are a tight squeeze into this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe My Guy is a Wiggle Worm
customer_reviews.text: My little guy does not feel secure in this style of seat. He went from the car seat to this with just the seat belt to secure him in. He moves around a lot, so maybe that is why is ends up pushing this almost completely out from under his bottom? He ends up with his tush between the booster and the actual car seat. But again... this may just be because he hates to sit still?
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Bucket Seat Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves going for rides in daddy's racecar! She was just a little unhappy she couldnt see out the front. With this cheap booster seat, she's all smiles and laughter, and always wanting to go fast! Well, more so now than before she couldn't see nothing but the tops of trees lol! If you have a racecar with bucket seats, look no further and get these! Matched with my 4-point harness, this little princess doesn't move!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Help Grandson coming and finally just a booster seat
customer_reviews.text: No learning curve needed to figure out this booster seat. Instruction are under seat cover if you are someone that doesn't read instructions. My grandson is able to strap himself in and out. The only problem was when he fell asleep. When using his regular car seat his body was supported when sleeping. Today when he fell asleep he just slipped sideways on the seat still strapped in twisted in the seat belt, this was not a safe situation. For long trips you almost need to have someone in the back seat to support those little bodies
customer_reviews.author: Sue Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a real step up for your little one:)
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 41 inch-3yr old son..Now he can really see out of the windows:)The seat stays in place,no shifting,seems sturdy..so thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: LocMommy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you have space issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son who is almost 8, tall for his age but skinny. This thing was too small for him, armrests were pushing into his sides and it was uncomfortable overall. Unless you have a small car or need to fit 3 boosters, buy something else. I returned it and bought Graco Turbobooster LX with latch.
customer_reviews.author: Majky

customer_reviews.title: So easy to move around/take with you!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! It's cute, VERY lightweight, doesn't take up much room in the car. Not very padded but my kids never complained. I've had one for 3 years, still going strong and this is for my son who is now ready for his "big boy seat"
customer_reviews.author: brandy w

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to use. My 6yrs old daughter likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Wen

customer_reviews.title: Great for home car use; easy, durable. Not portable (too bulky) so not for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Great car booster seat for kids (minimum 40 lbs and 53" tall). Just have the rear seat belts tuck under each arm rest. Great value. But it's too bulky to take with you while traveling on vacation. This is really only for leaving in the car. I've had mine since mid 2014 and it's still in perfect condition with constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Yiu Wai Chan

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in our Subaru outback in the middle seat between ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in our Subaru outback in the middle seat between two other car seats! (We just needed an extender for the middle seatbelt so our daughter in the booster could buckle herself in. This booster doesn't attach to anything, just sits in the seat so it is easy to transfer between cars.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Paris

customer_reviews.title: Simple and convenient
customer_reviews.text: My nephews are 5 & 7 but I don't have them with me most of the time. These seats are very small and compact and stackable, so I have them when I need them, but can move them out of the way when they're not in use. PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Hawaii where we didn’t want to lug around our car seat. Our daughter just meets the requirements for a booster, so we picked this up. It’s really light weight and easy to travel with. I don’t recommend it for an everyday seat since it has very little padding and I can’t imagine it’s comfortable to sit on for long periods. But for the price, this is a great deal for a travel or backup booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good basic booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat has worked so well I have bought 3 so far - for me, for my parents, and for my kids' friend's parents. It is perfect for the kid who is a little bit tall for a car seat, but still needs a boost for the seat belt and shoulder strap to fit properly. It's also narrower than other booster seats and car seats we've used (we carpool and everyone must be properly secured). The best part is that it can fit in the middle seat between 2 car seats or 2 large adults.
customer_reviews.author: Badger family

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for minimal price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 8 yr old granddaughter to make the seatbelt sit across her shoulder in correct possition without rubbing her neck. Work out great, she picked this out herself from Amazon and we are both happy with it. She says it is comfortable, and I liked the very Aforadable price!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist car booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Great minimalist car booster seat. However, a primary reason to buy such a booster is to have it for traveling on airplanes. Yet, it doesn't have handle or a place to attach to luggage with a hook, or something like that. That would definitely help carrying this thru airports.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but.....
customer_reviews.text: It is really one of the cheapest car seat out there. To fasten it is pretty easy, anyone with experience of fastening a seat belt can do. However, because of the simple design, it is also hard to get it securely fasten to the car without wobbling. After my kid sits on it, she can easily topple over to the side if she tries to pick up an object on the next seat. I think most most boosters are like this though. This one just feel a little lightweight so I would recommend heavier, older kids to use this, instead of younger kids who just barely pass the legal weight threshold.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Great narrower very basic booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine with this seat, it's basically basic and I liked that it's not as wide as others but I didn't like that it doesn't have the red seat belt attachment to lower the seat belt to my child's height. Unfortunately I didn't keep this seat just because of that reason.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lechu

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for a big kid
customer_reviews.text: This seat feels cheap. It is not very tall, which made the seat belt cross my kiddos neck dangerously. We needed to put a cushion under her to boost her to a safe height. It is also lacking some nice features like a strap holder, a cup holder, or a carrying handle that are available in models of comparable price. It might work better when she gets taller, but we just bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Griesel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this model many times and it’s become my go-to. My girls love the colors and I love the price. I always keep extras on hand in case they have friends over or they’re going off with someone else. Now, everyone they ride with has their own booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Oswalt

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in Porsche 911 backseat
customer_reviews.text: Husband really wanted to get the super practical family car, Porsche 911 S... I figured he may as well get it while our son is still small enough to sit in the back. He's 5 turning 6 and still needs a booster. Porsche 911 has narrow backseats separated by a small island and this booster just sits perfectly in the spot. Our two other boosters were too wide. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice carseat. Super compact.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old. Its compact which is great because I'm able to fit his booster, a convertible carseat, and an infant carseat in the back seat of my jeep patriot. I just wish it had a latch system.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: 5stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light and great color ! Worth the money and good for three row seating . We have two car seats in the back so we needed something small and compact and this did the trick . My son says it’s very comfortable . The price was great
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Laclair

customer_reviews.title: Softer than most
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a old booster with no padding. Took a road trip and it was tuff for her to sit that long. Got her this one and has a lot more padding than most. Hope this helps her sit longer in the car and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat last time I had to travel (airplane) with my daughter and I didn't want to carry along the more sophisticated car seat we have in our truck. This booster did the job and was easy to travel with. I don't use it for long distance drives but for the everyday street needs it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boost for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this booster. I bought multiple while it was on sale. It is perfect as an extra in my car for when I have friends or families children with me. It is lightweight and doesn't take up very much room at all while stored in the back when not in use. It is comfy and has been used by multiple kids already. And the color is cute too!
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: It Fits
customer_reviews.text: This fits well in my BMW 5-Series. My sons other booster seats are too wide for this vehicles backseat making it hard to find the buckle. It lacks drink holders and isn’t the most comfortable but for around town it works.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bolda

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has always found it comfortable, from when she was just big enough, until now, when she's almost out of it. It's very lightweight, which is nice when you have to move it around, share it, or take it in your luggage. It's the one we always prefer to throw in a duffel bag to use later in a rental car. It's pretty compact to have in the car when you're not using it.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW P THWING

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a third carseat to use in my Nissan Murano for the grandkids. This one fits great with one other booster seat and a full size seat for a younger child. The price is great, too. The only downside is that the padding is very thin so we wouldn't use it for long trips, but for occasional use/short trips, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: minimal and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: read a lot of reviews that claim this wasnt so comfortable however my picky 4 yr old daughter loves it. not sure how top safety this is but it works for me...for the price we got two so we dont have to move it from dad's car to mom's
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Adess

customer_reviews.title: Recomend.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size if you have other carseats. I have to fit 3 across my back row. Before I found this one we had trouble getting to the buckles. This smaller size gave just enough room.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good Booster
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a backlog booster seat so I did not have to constantly remove my large forward facing car seat for my now 6 year old. It’s been great. It’s so light and easy to move to other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My kids say it's comfortable. It meets the standards for safety (at least in Ohio). I haven't taken the kids on a long trip in them yet, but they are surprisingly light. I kind of wish there was a way to lock them to the seat of the car, but they seem to be stable when the kids are in them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. Same quality as $50 booster
customer_reviews.text: Love these ! They are so light and easy to carry around. They serve their purpose exactly the same as a $40-$100 booster seat. My son says it’s comfy. For the price - and the fact that it’s pretty much identical to the ones that are 5 X the price - I’m pleased.!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy to use, but a little hard
customer_reviews.text: It's very light and easy to move from place to place, and it's of a sturdy and simple design. My son says that it hurts his butt a little bit because it has almost no padding and it's basically like sitting on a smooth contoured piece of plastic. That being said we drove 9,500 miles on our big summer road trip, the entire time my son was sitting on this, and never once did he complain out loud about being uncomfortable, it's only after we got home and I went to write this review that he told me that it kind of hurt his butt so ... it couldn't have been that bad could it?
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J. Ischo

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Small in width, not comfortable and cheap. You get what you pay for on this one. I would opt for a $25-$30 one. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Nuth

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Very light and simple, perfect for our daughter with nothing to complicate her seat since she can reach the cupholders anyway. She says the arm rests are appropriate for resting and it also keeps her centered. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice if looking for 3 across option.
customer_reviews.text: Love this booster seat. Perfect fit between graco 4 in 1 and infant car seat in my jeep grand cherokee. 5 year old doesnt complain about being uncomfortable or she cant buckle herself up. If you are looking for a booster this is a good choice. Not bulky or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kressa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booster
customer_reviews.text: This is second one we own. We needed an additional one for our carpool. It is important to look at the label on how to properly buckle up. It is not like other boosters. Kids do not complain in seat, easy to move from car to car, what more can I ask for at this amazing price!?
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The way this product is designed made it super uncomfortable for my little girl. The arms were snug against her hips and it wasn't all that safe with the way the seat belt was laying on her. This is not like the regular ones you can buy in the stores. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber F.

customer_reviews.title: Small size and light weight, easy to travel with in car
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a vacation trip and later realized that it is not approved for flight. Recommend for car travel due to the size and light weight. It is not for flight travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: A basic booster
customer_reviews.text: Basic, but good. Sometimes things like this have too much added on nonsense, like cup holders and such, driving the cost of simple items way up. This isn’t one of them. Simple plastic design, with removable fabric outer makes for easily clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Myers

customer_reviews.title: compact and convenient
customer_reviews.text: bought to replace outdated booster. Like these seats because they do not take excessive room. the grandchildren do not complain of any discomfort and seem content when sitting in them. simple to keep clean--no intricate parts for crumbs and goop. Weue 2 boosters and a car seat in the back seat. This fits fine with room enough for all. These also are not heavy but light to take in out of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter outgrew her high back booster and wanted something more portable and smaller. This fits the bill. She loves that it is so lightweight she can carry it herself. She is 9 years old and about 60 lbs. It is perfect for her. It felt hard when we pulled it out of the box and I was worried she would say it was uncomfortable, but she is loving it!! For the price, can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Two Girls of Mine

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a cup holder...
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic booster seat. It does what it's supposed to do, without any bells and whistles. I use it in my car as an extra for when I driving carpool to/from my kids' various activities. I do wish it had a cup holder, thus the one-start ding. Otherwise, it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Queen City Mama

customer_reviews.title: Fits in bucket racing seats
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 4-year-old to use in my husband's rail buggy, which has Corbeau bucket racing-style seats in it. This booster is shaped perfectly and allows our son to legally ride in the buggy. It works fine with the 4-point harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: L. Potraffke

customer_reviews.title: Not enough padding in seat
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad for the price, and my granddaughter loved the color, but the seat is really hard with very little padding. Not great for long trips, fine for the occasional drive to the park or down to the store with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: carrie d groves

customer_reviews.title: Priced well, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a backup booster for my son in my husbands car. This was a decently priced one (under $30) and he actually prefers it to his other ones. It's lower, since he's getting taller, and not so bulky that he can't find the buckle to snap his belt into.
customer_reviews.author: Snorman

customer_reviews.title: It's good but it doesn't fit my car
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids and I would like them to fit in my Prius. Unfortunately, this booster does not fit in between my other car seats. The quality of the product is good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Swann

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person.
customer_reviews.text: The coloring on my screen makes the seat we ordered look like a bright pink with taupe, but when it arrived I was pleased to find it much more pleasantly colored: a sort of magenta against classic gray. My daughter loves it. She's just about to outgrow the legal need for a booster but I still prefer her to have one for the height, and better seatbelt positioning across her body. This is light enough that she can more than easily manage moving it to whichever seat she chooses in the car. Just want we needed.
customer_reviews.author: akme

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good backup booster seat. For the price, and for a booster we will only use a few times a month, it's great! But my son doesn't like it as well as his regular Graco booster. Easy to move between cars. Great for grandma's car.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be higher.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bit higher, it's probably about only 3 inches high. Also, it has no straps or latches to secure it to the car (you have to use the lap belt and hook it around the handles/arm rests). No cupholders wither.
customer_reviews.author: vadim knobel

customer_reviews.title: We fit 3 in a row!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 boys of my own but often have my niece with me and I was looking for booster seats where I could fit 3 in a row. These fit great in my 2010 Toyota Highlander and all 3 kids said the seats were very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great as a spare
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is super light weight and easy to move around. It's a little bulky so not the best if you need to take it on a plane. But works great for around town or if you will be transporting extra kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy-me

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable, and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is sturdy, comfortable, and lightweight. Pretty simple but it's all you need. You can easily remove the cover and wash it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: coloradddo

customer_reviews.title: Short distance worthy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a carpooling momma and need to get 3 PreK boys to school so this fits the bill. It was inexpensive and I was able to get two in a row in addition to my son's already there Batman carseat. However if I was using it as an everyday day booster for my son this would not be my product of choice because I would prefer a latch system and something a bit more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Booster
customer_reviews.text: Easy booster, loved the camo, very light weight and easy to move from car to car. My son said it was comfortable to sit in as well. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Super light and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Using this one in the middle of our other two car seats. A bit more difficult to use the seatbelts for one of the car seats on the side but manageable. Perfect if u have a regular car not an suv
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Light weight Low Profile
customer_reviews.text: My kid is 8 but she’s very petite. I needed a not in the way car seat for her to easily get in and out of for going to school and getting picked up and no longer make her feel like a baby. Works well for my needs and it’s lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: They are great, my twins love the colors. The only thing that could improve them is maybe a way to clip the seat in so it doesn't move around when they get in and out .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kneisley

customer_reviews.title: Good for a back up seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great back up seat. I got it for the babysitter's car and it's worked out well. My daughter can buckle and unbuckle herself into this seat. Its lightweight and portable. The base is wide though, I was hoping to be able to put this one in the middle seat of the Prius for when we transported friends and it doesn't work with the other booster and a 5-point harness seat also.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Small, Easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing weighs less than a preschoolers backpack. She (4) carries/throws it around like it's nothing. When we are transferring vehicles, it takes no time at all. Perfect for travelling/flying solo with a small kid.
customer_reviews.author: Terre L

customer_reviews.title: Ultra light travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for $20 each. They are made out of small foam packaging bb's molded into a very firm booster that weighs close to nothing
customer_reviews.author: kyli

customer_reviews.title: The padding is very thin and we have another booster seat that is more comfortable. This was a cheap seat so we got ...
customer_reviews.text: The distance between the arm rests and the body of the booster seat is very narrow and sometimes hard to get the seat belt on correctly. The padding is very thin and we have another booster seat that is more comfortable. This was a cheap seat so we got what we paid for. Should probably paid a little more and gotten a better seat.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

product_meta.title: Cosco Topside Booster Car Seat - Easy to Move, Lightweight Design (Turquoise)
product_meta.description: Color:TurquoiseCosco juvenile top side booster (turquoise). Give your child a comfy lift with the cosco top side booster featuring an extra-plush pad; With its lightweight design, it's easy to transition the topside booster from one car to another. 40-100 pounds and 43"-57". Extended, 100 pound weight limit fits more children. Extra-plush pad delivers more comfort and is removable for easy cleanup. Special seat-safe design leaves vehicle seats unmarked.
feature_bullets: Secure fit: The Cosco topside booster car seat gives your little one the extra height they need so that your car’s seat belt will fit safely and securely on them
Suitable for 40 100 pounds: The seat is designed to hold children weighing between 40 and 100 pounds and from 43″ to 57″ in height
Extra comfy plush pad: The booster helps make long rides more comfortable thanks to the plush padding on the seat
Easy to move and install: Need to change cars? The lightweight design and compact size make it easy to move from car to car; It’s that easy

Leaves car seats unmarked: The cosco topside booster seat has been carefully designed to leave your car seats unmarked; This will help keep your car seats to remain smoother, without the annoying indentations other seats leave behind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,447 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
